name: Edelrid Joker II Harness - Unisex
description: This no-nonsense harness features safety buckles that can't be fully undone. It's ideal for guiding schools, adventure education, and climbing rentals.Unpadded 45mm webbing waist and leg loops adjusts to fit a wide range of sizes.Waist and legs have non-opening buckles for security.Leg loops have markings to ensure harness is put on correctly.One size fits most.
